__e: The rifles and ammunition I throw in... free.

With our seven guns and yours... nothing bad could happen.
Those men out there have guns. And they don't exactly like what you're doing.
It seems like our rifles aren't strong enough to kill it.

The situation is, his guns are bigger than mine and he has more of them.
